pullrequest.title: Clean up Visuals on removal and add Visual Type

content.raw: Just to see if I'm understanding correctly, the right way to remove a visual from the scene is to remove each child? Or is it because in this case these are the ones which were added?
content.html: Just to see if I'm understanding correctly, the right way to remove a visual from the scene is to remove each child? Or is it because in this case these are the ones which were added?

pullrequest.title: Clean up Visuals on removal and add Visual Type

content.raw:
for now, whoever created the visual (any visual) should be responsible of removing it by calling `Scene::RemoveVisual`. 

In the future, we can think about letting the scene remove all of the visual's children to prevent stray visuals left in the scene's visual list.
content.html:
for now, whoever created the visual (any visual) should be responsible of removing it by calling Scene::RemoveVisual.

In the future, we can think about letting the scene remove all of the visual's children to prevent stray visuals left in the scene's visual list.
